channel.title: Softlayer_scale_policy_action on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_scale_policy_action on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Scale_Policy_Action
item.description: SoftLayer_Scale_Policy_Action Service Datatype Description An action to execute when a policy is triggered. Currently only one action can be associated with a policy and it must be created with the policy. Methods deleteObject Delete this action. editObject Edit this action. getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Scale_Policy_Action record. getScalePolicy Retrieve the policy this action is on. getType Retrieve the type of action.

item.title: SoftLayer_Scale_Policy_Action
item.description: SoftLayer_Scale_Policy_Action Datatype Description Local createDate When this action was created. Type: dateTime deleteFlag When set and true any edit that happens on this object, be it calling edit on this directly or setting as a child while editing a parent object, will end up being a deletion. Type: boolean id An action's internal identifier. Type: integer modifyDate Then this action was last modified.
